name: harp-browserify-babel
description: A harp boilerplate with browserify and babel

scripts.dev: npm run bundle:dev && npm run copy && parallelshell 'harp server public' 'npm run watch'
scripts.prod: npm run bundle:prod && npm run copy && harp compile
scripts.bundle:dev: npm run clean:js && browserify src/**/*.js -p [ factor-bundle -o '> public/js/`basename $FILE`' ] > public/js/common.js
scripts.bundle:prod: npm run clean:js && browserify src/**/*.js -p [ factor-bundle -o 'uglifyjs -cm > public/js/`basename $FILE`' ] | uglifyjs -cm > public/js/common.js
scripts.copy: npm run clean:other && bash -O extglob -c 'cp -r src/!(js) public'
